title: The Leader
alternative_title: Ling Feng Zhe, Karl Marx The Animation,领风者
description: The Leader will talk about how Marx met his wife Jenny and their thwarted love story, as well as his friendship with Friedrich Engels, his close companion and co-author of the Communist Manifesto.
genre: [<Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Historical>, <Genre -> Romance>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>]
